title: Shameless
author: Camila Cabello
lyrics:
[00:10.66] Don't speak, no, don't try
[00:14.09] It's been a secret for the longest time
[00:17.12] Don't run (oh), no, don't hide
[00:21.18] Been running from it for the longest time
[00:24.28] So many mornings I woke up confused
[00:28.06] In my dreams, I do anything I want to you
[00:31.53] My emotions are naked, they're taking me out of my mind
[00:39.23] Right now I'm shameless
[00:43.64] Screamin' my lungs out for ya
[00:47.37] Not afraid to face it
[00:50.65] I need you more than I want to
[00:52.89] Need you more than I want to
[00:54.68] Show me you're shameless
[00:58.23] Write it on my neck, why don't ya?
[01:01.96] And I won't erase it
[01:05.40] I need you more than I want to
[01:07.87] Need you more than I want to
[01:09.48] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[01:12.82] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[01:16.48] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[01:20.40] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[01:23.95] So we're there
[01:25.74] Now it's real
[01:27.85] Now that you have me, do you want me still?
[01:30.77] My kisses are history, they go back a long time
[01:34.17] And I'm tired of loving somebody that's not mine
[01:37.64] So many mornings I woke up confused
[01:41.77] In my dreams, I do anything I want to you
[01:45.57] My emotions are naked, they're taking me out of my mind (mind)
[01:52.68] Right now I'm shameless
[01:57.33] Screamin' my lungs out for ya
[02:01.03] Not afraid to face it
[02:04.18] I need you more than I want to
[02:06.56] Need you more than I want to
[02:08.52] Show me you're shameless
[02:11.67] Write it on my neck, why don't ya?
[02:15.82] And I won't erase it
[02:19.06] I need you more than I want to
[02:21.30] Need you more than I want to
[02:23.37] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[02:26.64] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[02:30.36] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[02:34.16] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[02:37.91] There's just inches in between us
[02:40.50] I want you to give in, I want you to give in
[02:44.23] There is tension in between us
[02:47.82] I just wanna give in
[02:50.17] And I don't care if I'm forgiven
[02:52.72] Right now I'm shameless
[02:56.43] Screamin' my lungs out for ya
[03:00.04] Not afraid to face it
[03:03.13] I need you more than I want to
[03:05.69] Need you more than I want to
[03:07.59] Show me you're shameless
[03:10.99] Write it on my neck, why don't ya?
[03:14.76] And I won't erase it
[03:17.96] I need you more than I want to
[03:20.33] I need you more than I want to
[03:22.34] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[03:25.74] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[03:29.52] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
[03:33.07] Nuh-uh, uh-uh, don't wanna do this now
